title: It’s Their Moment: Lady Gaga, ‘Golden,’ Sabrina Carpenter & More 2026 Grammy Pop Predictions
summary: On the Billboard Pop Shop Podcast, Katie & Keith are taking a closer look at the pop categories ahead of Sunday's show.
body: Heading into Sunday’s Grammy Awards, Kendrick Lamar is the leading nominee with nine nods, but the Recording Academy’s 2026 pop queen has to be Lady Gaga with seven nominations — including four nods in categories with “pop” in their name. Related A Complete Guide to Every 2026 Grammy Party & Event (Updating) Grammy Nominations 2026: See the Complete List All 8 Best New Artist Nominees Set to Perform on 2026 Grammy Awards On the new Billboard Pop Shop Podcast , Katie & Keith are taking a closer look at five pop categories for Sunday night: best pop solo performance, best pop duo/group performance, best pop vocal album, best dance pop recording, and best traditional pop album. Who do we think will take home pop gold? Listen to the new episode below: Also on the show, we’ve got chart news on how there are four albums that debut in the top 10 on the Billboard 200 — including a new No. 1 — and how Bad Bunny hops back into the top three thanks to a new vinyl release. Plus, on the Billboard Hot 100, Olivia Dean’s “Man I Need” climbs to No. 2 for the first time, while “I Just Might” from Bruno Mars holds at No. 1. And over on the all-genre S…

title: What happened to custom ROMs? [Video]
summary: Rewind almost 15 years, and the Android ROM scene was thriving. Nightly builds, tons of projects, we truly were living in a golden age. Nowadays, things have changed significantly. Just what happened to the custom ROM scene, and can it be revived? more…

title: Char Siu Pork and Other Cantonese Dishes Get an Update at This Hong Kong Restaurant
summary: Char siu pork made by chef ArChan Chan at Ho Lee Fook. | Eater Video Ho Lee Fook is redefining Cantonese food in Hong Kong, with chef ArChan Chan calling the spot — covered in mahjong tiles and beckoning gold cats — “a Chinese restaurant with a Hong Kong heart.” Chan’s modern renditions of classic …
